name: Fatal Push

rulings.text: Fatal Push can target any creature, even one with converted mana cost 5 or greater. The creature’s converted mana cost is checked only as Fatal Push resolves.
If the mana cost of a creature on the battlefield includes {X}, X is considered to be 0.

Revolt abilities check only whether a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn or not. They don’t apply multiple times if more than one permanent you controlled left the battlefield. They don’t check whether the permanent that left the battlefield is still in the zone it moved to.

Revolt abilities don’t care why the permanent left the battlefield, who caused it to move, or where it moved to. They’re equally satisfied by an artifact you sacrificed to pay a cost, a creature you controlled that was destroyed by Murder, or an enchantment you returned to your hand with Leave in the Dust.
Tokens that leave the battlefield will satisfy a revolt ability.
Energy counters aren’t permanents. Paying {E} won’t satisfy a revolt ability.

text: Destroy target creature if it has converted mana cost 2 or less. Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has converted mana cost 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

name: Mutavault

rulings.text: Although Mutavault has all creature types while it’s animated, it does not have the changeling keyword ability.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.
Examples of creature types include Sliver, Goblin, and Soldier. Creature types appear after the dash on the type line of creatures.

text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}: Mutavault becomes a 2/2 creature with all creature types until end of turn. It's still a land.

name: Snapcaster Mage

rulings.text: For split cards, the flashback cost you pay is determined by the half you cast
If you cast a spell from a graveyard using its flashback ability, you can’t pay other alternative costs (such as that of Foil).
If you cast an instant or sorcery with {X} in its mana cost this way, you still choose the value of X as part of casting the spell and pay that cost.
If an instant or sorcery card in your graveyard already has flashback, you may use either flashback ability to cast it from your graveyard.
You may pay any optional additional costs the spell has, such as kicker costs. You must pay any mandatory additional costs the spell has, such as that of Tormenting Voice.

text: Flash When Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Spellstutter Sprite

rulings.text: The value of X needs to be determined both when the ability triggers (so you can choose a target) and again when the ability resolves (to check if that target is still legal). If the number of Faeries you control has decreased enough in that time to make the target illegal, Spellstutter Sprite’s ability won’t resolve (and the targeted spell will resolve as normal).

text:
Flash
Flying
When Spellstutter Sprite enters the battlefield, counter target spell with converted mana cost X or less, where X is the number of Faeries you control.

foreign_names.name: Kriechende Teergrube
foreign_names.text:
Die Kriechende Teergrube kommt getappt ins Spiel.

{1}{U}{B}: Bis zum Ende des Zuges wird die Kriechende Teergrube zu einer 3/2 blauen und schwarzen Elementarwesen-Kreatur und ist unblockbar. Sie ist immer noch ein Land.

foreign_names.name: Lodazal reptante
foreign_names.text:
El Lodazal reptante entra al campo de batalla girado.
{T}: Agrega {U} o {B} a tu reserva de maná.
{1}{U}{B}: Hasta el final del turno, el Lodazal reptante es una criatura Elemental azul y negra 3/2 y es imbloqueable. Sigue siendo una tierra.

foreign_names.name: Fosse à goudron rampante
foreign_names.text:
La Fosse à goudron rampante arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.
{T} : Ajoutez {U} ou {B} à votre réserve.

foreign_names.name: Fossa di Catrame Strisciante
foreign_names.text:
La Fossa di Catrame Strisciante entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
{T}: Aggiungi {U} o {B} alla tua riserva di mana.
{1}{U}{B}: Fino alla fine del turno, la Fossa di Catrame Strisciante diventa una creatura Elementale 3/2 blu e nera e non può essere bloccata. È ancora una terra.

foreign_names.name: 忍び寄るタール坑
foreign_names.text:
忍び寄るタール坑はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{U}か{B}を加える。
{1}{U}{B}：ターン終了時まで、忍び寄るタール坑はブロックされない青であり黒である３/２のエレメンタル・クリーチャーになる。 それは土地でもある。

foreign_names.name: Poço de Piche Rastejante
foreign_names.text:

{T}: Adicione {U} ou {B} à sua reserva de mana.
{1}{U}{B}: Até o final do turno, Poço de Piche Rastejante torna-se uma criatura azul e preta 3/2 do tipo Elemental e não pode ser bloqueada. Ela ainda conta como um terreno.

foreign_names.name: Ползучая Смоляная Яма
foreign_names.text:
Ползучая Смоляная Яма выходит на поле битвы повернутой.
{T}: добавьте {U} или {B} в ваше хранилище маны.
{1}{U}{B}: до конца хода Ползучая Смоляная Яма становится существом 3/2 синий и черный Элементаль и не может быть заблокирована. При этом она остается землей.

恶心焦油坑须横置进战场。

rulings.text: A land that becomes a creature may be affected by “summoning sickness.” You can’t attack with it or use any of its {T} abilities (including its mana abilities) unless it began your most recent turn on the battlefield under your control. Note that summoning sickness cares about when that permanent came under your control, not when it became a creature.

When a land becomes a creature, that doesn’t count as having a creature enter the battlefield. The permanent was already on the battlefield; it only changed its types. Abilities that trigger whenever a creature enters the battlefield won’t trigger.

text:
Creeping Tar Pit enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
{1}{U}{B}: Creeping Tar Pit becomes a 3/2 blue and black Elemental creature until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. It's still a land.

flavor:
"Knowledge is such a burden. Release it. Release all your fears to me." 
—Ashiok, Nightmare Weaver

foreign_names.flavor: „Wissen ist solch eine Bürde. Mache dich frei davon. Befreie all deine Ängste und gib sie mir." —Ashiok der Albtraumweber
foreign_names.name: Gedankenergreifung
foreign_names.text: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl zeigt die Karten auf seiner Hand offen vor. Bestimme davon eine Karte, die kein Land ist. Dieser Spieler wirft diese Karte ab. Du verlierst 2 Lebenspunkte.

foreign_names.flavor: "El conocimiento es una pesada carga. Libérate de ella. Entrégame todos tus temores". —Ashiok, urdidor de pesadillas
foreign_names.name: Confiscar pensamientos
foreign_names.text: El jugador objetivo muestra su mano. Eliges de ahí una carta que no sea tierra. Ese jugador descarta esa carta. Pierdes 2 vidas.

foreign_names.flavor: « Le savoir est un tel fardeau. Soulagez-vous. Confiez-moi toutes vos peurs. » —Ashiok, tisseur de cauchemars
foreign_names.name: Saisie des pensées
foreign_names.text: Le joueur ciblé révèle sa main. Choisissez-y une carte non-terrain. Ce joueur se défausse de cette carte. Vous perdez 2 points de vie.

foreign_names.flavor: "La conoscenza è un tale fardello. Lascialo andare. Lascia a me tutte le tue paure." —Ashiok, Tessitore di Incubi
foreign_names.name: Rubapensieri
foreign_names.text: Un giocatore bersaglio rivela la sua mano. Scegli una carta non terra da quella mano. Quel giocatore scarta quella carta. Perdi 2 punti vita.

foreign_names.flavor: 「知識とは時に重荷となる。解放せよ。お主の恐怖を残らず私に解き放つのだ。」 ――悪夢の織り手、アショク
foreign_names.name: 思考囲い
foreign_names.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分の手札を公開する。あなたはその中から土地でないカードを１枚選ぶ。そのプレイヤーはそのカードを捨てる。あなたは２点のライフを失う。

foreign_names.flavor: "지식은 곧 두려움이니 모두 내려놓게. 네 두려움은 내가 다 가져가겠네." —악몽을 부르는 아시오크
foreign_names.name: 지식의 강탈
foreign_names.text: 플레이어 한 명을 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 손을 공개한다. 그 중 대지가 아닌 카드 한 장을 선택한다. 그 플레이어는 그 카드를 버린다. 당신은 생명 2점을 잃는다.

foreign_names.flavor: "O conhecimento é um fardo tão pesado... Libere-se dele. Libere todos os seus medos para mim." — Ashiok, Tecedor de Pesadelos
foreign_names.name: Capturar Pensamento
foreign_names.text: O jogador alvo revela sua própria mão. Você escolhe um card que não seja um terreno da mão dele. Aquele jogador descarta aquele card. Você perde 2 pontos de vida.

foreign_names.flavor: «Знание — тяжкое бремя. Избавься от него. Отдай все свои страхи мне». — Ашиок, Ткач Кошмаров
foreign_names.name: Уловить Мысль
foreign_names.text: Целевой игрок показывает свою руку. Вы выбираете из нее карту, не являющуюся землей. Тот игрок сбрасывает ту карту. Вы теряете 2 жизни.

foreign_names.flavor: 「知识是一种负担。释放它吧。将你所有的恐惧都释放给我。」 ～织魇师安梭苛
foreign_names.name: 攫取思绪

foreign_names.text:
瞬速
瞬唱の魔道士が戦場に出たとき、あなたの墓地にあるインスタント・カード１枚かソーサリー・カード１枚を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それはフラッシュバックを得る。そのフラッシュバック・コストは、それのマナ・コストに等しい。（あなたはあなたの墓地から、そのカードをそれのフラッシュバック・コストで唱えてもよい。その後、それを追放する。）

foreign_names.name: 迅咒法师
foreign_names.text:
闪现
当迅咒法师进战场时，目标在你坟墓场中的瞬间或法术牌获得返照异能直到回合结束。其返照费用等同于该牌的法术力费用。（你可以从你的坟墓场施放该牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

name: Snapcaster Mage
original_text: Flash When Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

rulings.text: For split cards, the flashback cost you pay is determined by the half you cast
If you cast a spell from a graveyard using its flashback ability, you can’t pay other alternative costs (such as that of Foil).
If you cast an instant or sorcery with {X} in its mana cost this way, you still choose the value of X as part of casting the spell and pay that cost.
If an instant or sorcery card in your graveyard already has flashback, you may use either flashback ability to cast it from your graveyard.
You may pay any optional additional costs the spell has, such as kicker costs. You must pay any mandatory additional costs the spell has, such as that of Tormenting Voice.

text: Flash When Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

flavor:
"I fear that as we scurry after phantoms, the Dimir pull nine puppet strings." 
—Ral Zarek

foreign_names.flavor: „Ich fürchte, wir jagen Phantomen nach. Die Dimir ziehen an neun Marionettenfäden." —Ral Zarek
foreign_names.name: Nasses Grab
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {U} oder {B}.)
Sowie das Nasse Grab ins Spiel kommt, kannst du 2 Lebenspunkte bezahlen. Falls du dies nicht tust, kommt das Nasse Grab getappt ins Spiel.

foreign_names.flavor: "Temo que estemos corriendo tras unos fantasmas. Los dimir manejan nueve hilos de titiritero."—Ral Zarek
foreign_names.name: Tumba inundada
foreign_names.text: ({T}: Agrega {U} o {B} a tu reserva de maná.)En cuanto la Tumba inundada entre al campo de batalla, puedes pagar 2 vidas. Si no lo haces, la Tumba inundada entra al campo de batalla girada.

foreign_names.flavor: « Nous courons après des fantômes, j'en ai peur. Les Dimir tirent les ficelles de neuf marionnettes. » —Ral Zarek
foreign_names.name: Tombe aquatique
foreign_names.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {U} ou {B} à votre réserve.)
Au moment où la Tombe aquatique arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez payer 2 points de vie. Si vous ne le faites pas, la Tombe aquatique arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.

foreign_names.flavor: "Temo che stiamo dando la caccia ai fantasmi. I Dimir manovrano nove fili di burattini." —Ral Zarek
foreign_names.name: Tomba d'Acqua
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {U} o {B} alla tua riserva di mana.)
Mentre la Tomba d'Acqua entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi pagare 2 punti vita. Se non lo fai, la Tomba d'Acqua entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.

foreign_names.flavor: 「俺達は幻影を追っているだけかもしれない。ディミーア家は９体の操り人形を動かしてるんだ。」――ラル・ザレック
foreign_names.name: 湿った墓
foreign_names.text: （{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{U}か{B}を加える。）湿った墓が戦場に出るに際し、あなたはライフを２点支払ってもよい。そうしない場合、湿った墓はタップ状態で戦場に出る。

foreign_names.flavor: "우리가 허깨비를 쫓고 있는 동안 디미르 놈들이 나머지 아홉 길드를 갖고 노는게 아닌지 걱정되는군." —랄 자렉
foreign_names.name: 수몰된 무덤
foreign_names.text:
({T}: {U} 또는 {B}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.)
수몰된 무덤이 전장에 들어오면서, 당신은 생명 2점을 지불할 수 있다. 그렇게 하지 않는다면, 수몰된 무덤은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.

foreign_names.flavor: "Receio que estamos correndo atrás de fantasmas. Os Dimir puxam as cordas de nove fantoches."— Ral Zarek
foreign_names.name: Túmulo Aquático
foreign_names.text: ({T}: Adicione {U} ou {B} à sua reserva de mana.)Conforme Túmulo Aquático entra no campo de batalha, você pode pagar 2 pontos de vida. Se não fizer isso, Túmulo Aquático entrará no campo de batalha virado.

foreign_names.flavor: «Боюсь, что мы гоняемся за призраками. Мы всего лишь марионетки Димиров, и все ниточки в их руках». — Рал Зарек
foreign_names.name: Водная Могила
foreign_names.text:
({T}: добавьте {U} или {B} в ваше хранилище маны.)
При выходе Водной Могилы на поле битвы вы можете заплатить 2 жизни. Если вы этого не делаете, Водная Могила выходит на поле битвы повернутой.

foreign_names.flavor: 「我们可能只是在追寻鬼影，给底密尔扯着九条傀儡丝。」 ～拉尔查雷克
foreign_names.name: 积水墓地
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：{U}或{B}到你的法术力池中。）
于积水墓地进战场时，你可以支付2点生命。如果你未如此作，积水墓地须横置进战场。

foreign_names.flavor: 「我們可能只是在追尋鬼影，給底密爾扯著九條傀儡絲。」 ～拉爾查雷克
foreign_names.name: 積水墓地
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{U}或{B}到你的魔法力池中。）
於積水墓地進戰場時，你可以支付2點生命。如果你未如此作，積水墓地須橫置進戰場。

name: Watery Grave
original_text:
({T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.)
As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Watery Grave enters the battlefield tapped.

rulings.text: Unlike most dual lands, this land has two basic land types. It’s not basic, so cards such as District Guide can’t find it, but it does have the appropriate land types for effects such as that of Drowned Catacomb (from the Ixalan set).
If an effect puts this land onto the battlefield tapped, you may pay 2 life, but it still enters tapped.

text: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.) As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

foreign_names.name: Schnellzauberer
foreign_names.text:
Aufblitzen
Wenn der Schnellzauberer ins Spiel kommt, erhält eine Spontanzauber- oder Hexerei-Karte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof bis zum Ende des Zuges Rückblende dazu. Die Rückblendekosten sind gleich ihrer Manakosten. (Du kannst jene Karte aus deinem Friedhof für ihre Rückblendekosten wirken.Schicke sie danach ins Exil.)

foreign_names.name: Mago lanzachasquidos
foreign_names.text:
Destello.
Cuando el Mago lanzachasquidos entre al campo de batalla, la carta de instantáneo o conjuro objetivo en tu cementerio gana retrospectiva hasta el final del turno. Su coste de retrospectiva es igual a su coste de maná. (Puedes lanzar esta carta desde tu cementerio pagando su coste de retrospectiva. Luego exíliala.)

foreign_names.name: Mage lancevif
foreign_names.text:
Flash
Quand le Mage lancevif arrive sur le champ de bataille, une carte d'éphémère ou de rituel ciblée de votre cimetière acquiert le flashback jusqu'à la fin du tour. Le coût de flashback est égal à son coût de mana. (Vous pouvez lancer cette carte depuis votre cimetière pour son coût de flashback. Puis exilez-la.)

foreign_names.name: Mago Lanciorapido
foreign_names.text:
Lampo
Quando il Mago Lanciorapido entra nel campo di battaglia, una carta istantaneo o stregoneria bersaglio nel tuo cimitero ha flashback fino alla fine del turno. Il costo di flashback è pari al suo costo di mana. (Puoi lanciare quella carta dal tuo cimitero pagando il suo costo di flashback. Poi esiliala.)

foreign_names.name: 瞬唱の魔道士
foreign_names.text:
瞬速
瞬唱の魔道士が戦場に出たとき、あなたの墓地にあるインスタント・カード１枚かソーサリー・カード１枚を対象とする。それはターン終了時までフラッシュバックを得る。 フラッシュバック・コストは、それ自身のマナ・コストに等しい。 （あなたはフラッシュバック・コストで、そのカードをあなたの墓地から唱えてもよい。その後、それを追放する。）

foreign_names.name: 찰나의 마도사
foreign_names.text:
섬광찰나의 마도사가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신의 무덤에 있는 순간마법이나 집중마법 카드 한 장을 목표로 정한다. 그 카드는 턴종료까지
회상 능력을 얻는다. 회상 비용은 그 카드의 마나비용과 동일하다. (당신은 그 카드의 회상 비용을 지불해 그 카드를 무덤에서 발동할 수 있다. 그 후, 그 카드를 추방한다.)

foreign_names.name: Mago da Conjuração-relâmpago
foreign_names.text:
Lampejo
Quando Mago da Conjuração-relâmpago entra no campo de batalha, o card de mágica instantânea ou de feitiço alvo no seu cemitério ganha recapitular até o final do turno. O custo de recapitular é igual ao seu custo de mana. (Você pode conjurar este card de seu cemitério pagando seu custo de recapitular. Depois, exile-o.)

foreign_names.name: Маг Молниеносных Заклинаний
foreign_names.text:
Миг
Когда Маг Молниеносных Заклинаний выходит на поле битвы, целевая карта мгновенного заклинания или волшебства на вашем кладбище получает Воспоминание до конца хода. Стоимость Воспоминания равна ее мана-стоимости. (Вы можете разыграть ту карту из вашего кладбища за ее стоимость Воспоминания. Затем изгоните ее.)

foreign_names.name: 迅咒法师

当迅咒法师进战场时，目标在你坟墓场中的瞬间或法术牌获得返照异能直到回合结束。 其返照费用等同于该咒语的法术力费用。 （你可以从你的坟墓场施放该牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

閃現
當迅咒法師進戰場時，目標在你墳墓場中的瞬間或巫術牌獲得返照異能直到回合結束。 其返照費用等同於該咒語的魔法力費用。 （你可以從你的墳墓場施放該牌，並支付其返照費用，然後將它放逐。）

name: Flooded Strand
text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Flooded Strand: Search your library for a Plains or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

flavor: In Lorwyn's brief evenings, the sun pauses at the horizon long enough for a certain species of violet to bloom with the fragrance of mischief.

foreign_names.flavor: ローウィンの短い夕刻の間、ある種のスミレが悪戯な香りを漂わせる花を咲かすのに十分な時間、太陽は地平線上に留まる。
foreign_names.name: 苦花
foreign_names.text: あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたは１点のライフを失い、飛行を持つ黒の１/１のフェアリー・ならず者・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。

name: Bitterblossom
original_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.

rulings.text: The effect is mandatory. You’ll lose 1 life even if you have only 1 life left.
The life loss isn’t a payment. You’ll get a token even if you had 0 life (and another effect is stopping you from losing the game).

text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.

foreign_names.name: 忍び寄るタール坑
foreign_names.text:
忍び寄るタール坑はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{U}か{B}を加える。
{1}{U}{B}：ターン終了時まで、忍び寄るタール坑は青であり黒である３/２のエレメンタル・クリーチャーになる。このターン、これはブロックされない。これは土地でもある。

name: Creeping Tar Pit
original_text:
Creeping Tar Pit enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
{1}{U}{B}: Creeping Tar Pit becomes a 3/2 blue and black Elemental creature until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. It's still a land.

rulings.text: A land that becomes a creature may be affected by “summoning sickness.” You can’t attack with it or use any of its {T} abilities (including its mana abilities) unless it began your most recent turn on the battlefield under your control. Note that summoning sickness cares about when that permanent came under your control, not when it became a creature.

When a land becomes a creature, that doesn’t count as having a creature enter the battlefield. The permanent was already on the battlefield; it only changed its types. Abilities that trigger whenever a creature enters the battlefield won’t trigger.

text:
Creeping Tar Pit enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
{1}{U}{B}: Creeping Tar Pit becomes a 3/2 blue and black Elemental creature until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. It's still a land.

flavor:
"As you inject the viscus vitae into the brain stem, don't let the spastic moaning bother you. It will soon become music to your ears." 
—Stitcher Geralf

foreign_names.flavor: 「脳幹に臓器剤を注入すれば、痙攣性のうめき声など気にならなくなる。すぐに音楽のように聞こえるだろう。」 ――縫い師、ゲラルフ
foreign_names.name: 思考掃き
foreign_names.text:
プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは、自分のライブラリーの一番上からカードを２枚自分の墓地に置く。
カードを１枚引く。

foreign_names.flavor: 「将生命精华注入脑干时，别让那些断续呻吟分了心。它很快就会化作耳中美妙乐章。」 ～拼接师基拉夫
foreign_names.name: 洗清思想
foreign_names.text:
目标牌手将其牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。
抓一张牌。

name: Thought Scour
original_text:
Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: If the target player is an illegal target when Thought Scour tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t draw a card.
Follow the instructions in the order listed on the card: if you target yourself, you’ll put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard and then draw a card.

text:
Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.
Draw a card.

flavor: "Any dream is a robust harvest. Still, I prefer the timeworn dreams, heavy with import, that haunt the obsessive mind."

foreign_names.flavor: 「すべての夢は生命あふれた収穫だ。だけど私は、古ぼけて意味ありげで、何かに取り付かれたような夢が好きだね。」
foreign_names.name: 思考囲い
foreign_names.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分の手札を公開する。あなたはその中から土地でないカード１枚を選ぶ。そのプレイヤーはそのカードを捨てる。あなたは２点のライフを失う。

foreign_names.flavor: 「任何眠梦都是醇厚的收获。不过，我还是偏好被时间消蚀、折磨着受苦心灵又充满含义的梦想。」
foreign_names.name: 攫取思绪
foreign_names.text: 目标牌手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张非地牌。该牌手弃掉该牌。你失去2点生命。

name: Thoughtseize
original_text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

rulings.text: The loss of life is part of the spell’s effect. It’s not an additional cost. If Thoughtseize doesn’t resolve, you won’t lose life.
If you target yourself with this spell, you must reveal your entire hand to the other players just as any other player would.

text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

flavor: Some worlds possess a hidden core where life's essence constantly surges.

foreign_names.flavor: Manche Welten besitzen einen verborgenen Kern, in dem die Essenz des Lebens ständig wogt.
foreign_names.name: Ändergewölbe
foreign_names.text: {T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}.{1}: Das Ändergewölbe wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer 2/2 Kreatur mit allen Kreaturentypen. Es ist immer noch ein Land.

foreign_names.flavor: Algunos mundos poseen un núcleo oculto donde la esencia de la vida surge constantemente.
foreign_names.name: Mutabóveda
foreign_names.text: {T}: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná.{1}: La Mutabóveda se convierte en una criatura 2/2 con todos los tipos de criatura hasta el final del turno. Sigue siendo una tierra.

foreign_names.flavor: Certains mondes recèlent un noyau caché d'où jaillit en permanence l'essence de la vie.
foreign_names.name: Mutecaveau
foreign_names.text: {T} : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve.{1} : Le Mutecaveau devient une créature 2/2 avec tous les types de créature jusqu'à la fin du tour. C'est toujours un terrain.

foreign_names.flavor: Alcuni mondi possiedono un cuore nascosto dove l'essenza della vita pulsa continuamente.
foreign_names.name: Grotta Mutevole
foreign_names.text: {T}: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana.{1}: La Grotta Mutevole diventa una creatura 2/2 con tutti i tipi di creatura fino alla fine del turno. È ancora una terra.

foreign_names.flavor: いくつかの世界は、生命の本質が常に噴出する見えざる核を持っている。
foreign_names.name: 変わり谷
foreign_names.text: {T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。{1}：ターン終了時まで、変わり谷はすべてのクリーチャー・タイプを持つ２/２のクリーチャーになる。これは土地でもある。

foreign_names.flavor: 몇몇 차원의 중심에는 생명의 정기를 분출하는 숨은 핵이 있다.
foreign_names.name: 변이의 방
foreign_names.text: {T}: {1}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.{1}: 변이의 방은 턴종료까지 모든 생물 유형인 2/2 생물이 된다. 변이의 방은 생물이 된 후에도 여전히 대지다.

foreign_names.flavor: Alguns mundos possuem um núcleo oculto de onde a essência vital é irradiada constantemente.
foreign_names.name: Caverna Mutável
foreign_names.text: {T}: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana.{1}: Caverna Mutável torna-se uma criatura 2/2 com todos os tipos de criatura até o final do turno. Ela ainda conta como um terreno.

foreign_names.flavor: У некоторых миров есть скрытое ядро, в котором непрестанно пульсирует сама сущность жизни.

name: Mutavault
original_text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.{1}: Mutavault becomes a 2/2 creature with all creature types until end of turn. It's still a land.

rulings.text: Although Mutavault has all creature types while it’s animated, it does not have the changeling keyword ability.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.
Examples of creature types include Sliver, Goblin, and Soldier. Creature types appear after the dash on the type line of creatures.

foreign_names.name: Tödlicher Stoß
foreign_names.text:
Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, falls sie umgewandelte Manakosten von 2 oder weniger hat.
Rebellion — Falls in diesem Zug eine bleibende Karte unter deiner Kontrolle das Spiel verlassen hat, zerstöre stattdessen die Kreatur, falls sie umgewandelte Manakosten von 4 oder weniger hat.

foreign_names.name: Empujón fatal
foreign_names.text:
Destruye la criatura objetivo si tiene un coste de maná convertido de 2 o menos.
Revuelta — Destruye esa criatura si tiene un coste de maná convertido de 4 o menos en vez de eso si un permanente que controlabas dejó el campo de batalla este turno.

foreign_names.name: Poussée fatale
foreign_names.text:
Détruisez la créature ciblée si son coût converti de mana est inférieur ou égal à 2.
Révolte — Détruisez cette créature si son coût converti de mana est inférieur ou égal à 4 à la place, si un permanent que vous contrôliez a quitté le champ de bataille ce tour-ci.

foreign_names.name: Spinta Fatale
foreign_names.text:
Distruggi una creatura bersaglio se ha costo di mana convertito pari o inferiore a 2.
Rivolta — Se un permanente che controllavi ha lasciato il campo di battaglia in questo turno, distruggi invece quella creatura se ha costo di mana convertito pari o inferiore a 4.

foreign_names.name: 致命的な一押し
foreign_names.text:
クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それの点数で見たマナ・コストが２以下であるなら、それを破壊する。
紛争 ― このターンにあなたがコントロールするパーマネントが戦場を離れていたなら、代わりに、そのクリーチャーの点数で見たマナ・コストが４以下であるなら、それを破壊する。

foreign_names.name: 치명적 밀치기
foreign_names.text:
생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물의 전환마나비용이 2 이하라면 그 생물을 파괴한다.
봉기 — 당신이 조종한 지속물이 이 턴에 전장을 떠났다면, 대신에 전환마나비용이 4 이하라면 그 생물을 파괴한다.

foreign_names.name: Empurrão Fatal
foreign_names.text:
Destrua a criatura alvo se ela tiver custo de mana convertido igual ou inferior a 2.
Revolta — Em vez disso, destrua aquela criatura se ela tiver um custo de mana convertido igual ou inferior a 4 se uma permanente que você controlava deixou o campo de batalha neste turno.

foreign_names.name: Смертельный Толчок
foreign_names.text:
Уничтожьте целевое существо, если его конвертированная мана-стоимость равна 2 или меньше.
Бунт — Вместо этого уничтожьте то существо, если его конвертированная мана-стоимость равна 4 или меньше, и если находившийся под вашим контролем перманент покинул поле битвы в этом ходу.

foreign_names.name: 送终一击
foreign_names.text:
如果目标生物的总法术力费用等于或小于2，则消灭之。
反抗～如果本回合中曾有由你操控的永久物离开战场，则改为如果目标生物的总法术力费用等于或小于4，则消灭之。

foreign_names.name: 送終一擊
foreign_names.text:
如果目標生物的總魔法力費用等於或小於2，則消滅之。
反抗～如果本回合中曾有由你操控的永久物離開戰場，則改為如果目標生物的總魔法力費用等於或小於4，則消滅之。

name: Fatal Push
original_text: Destroy target creature if it has converted mana cost 2 or less. Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has converted mana cost 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

rulings.text: Fatal Push can target any creature, even one with converted mana cost 5 or greater. The creature’s converted mana cost is checked only as Fatal Push resolves.
If the mana cost of a creature on the battlefield includes {X}, X is considered to be 0.

Revolt abilities check only whether a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn or not. They don’t apply multiple times if more than one permanent you controlled left the battlefield. They don’t check whether the permanent that left the battlefield is still in the zone it moved to.

Revolt abilities don’t care why the permanent left the battlefield, who caused it to move, or where it moved to. They’re equally satisfied by an artifact you sacrificed to pay a cost, a creature you controlled that was destroyed by Murder, or an enchantment you returned to your hand with Leave in the Dust.
Tokens that leave the battlefield will satisfy a revolt ability.
Energy counters aren’t permanents. Paying {E} won’t satisfy a revolt ability.

text: Destroy target creature if it has converted mana cost 2 or less. Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has converted mana cost 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

rulings.text: If one of these lands is your first, second, or third land, it enters the battlefield untapped. If you control three or more other lands, however, it enters the battlefield tapped.

If one of these lands enters the battlefield at the same time as one or more other lands (due to Oblivion Sower or Warp World, perhaps), it doesn’t take those lands into consideration when determining how many other lands you control.

flavor: Where dragons once prevailed, their bones now sink.

foreign_names.flavor: Wo Drachen einst herrschten, versinken nun ihre Knochen.
foreign_names.name: Verschmutztes Delta
foreign_names.text: {T}, bezahle 1 Lebenspunkt, opfere das Verschmutzte Delta: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Insel- oder Sumpf-Karte und bringe sie ins Spiel. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.

foreign_names.flavor: Allá donde en otro tiempo dominaban los dragones, ahora se sumergen sus huesos.
foreign_names.name: Delta contaminado
foreign_names.text: {T}, pagar 1 vida, sacrificar el Delta contaminado: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de isla o pantano y ponla en el campo de batalla. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.

foreign_names.flavor: Là où les dragons s'imposaient jadis, leurs os sombrent désormais.
foreign_names.name: Estuaire pollué
foreign_names.text: {T}, payez 1 point de vie, sacrifiez l'Estuaire pollué : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte d'île ou de marais et mettez-la sur le champ de bataille. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.

foreign_names.flavor: Dove un tempo si libravano i draghi, ora affondano le loro ossa.
foreign_names.name: Delta Inquinato
foreign_names.text: {T}, Paga 1 punto vita, Sacrifica il Delta Inquinato: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta Isola o Palude e mettila sul campo di battaglia. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.

foreign_names.flavor: かつて龍たちが繁栄した場所には、今では彼らの骨が沈んでいる。
foreign_names.name: 汚染された三角州
foreign_names.text: {T}, ライフを１点支払う,汚染された三角州を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから島・カードか沼・カードを１枚探し、それを戦場に出す。その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。

foreign_names.flavor: 한때 용들이 만연했던 이곳에는 이제 가라앉는 용의 뼈만 남아있다.
foreign_names.name: 오염된 삼각주
foreign_names.text: {T}, 생명 1점을 지불한다, 오염된 삼각주를 희생한다: 당신의 서고에서 섬이나 늪 카드 한 장을 찾아 전장에 놓는다. 그러고 나서 당신의 서고를 섞는다.

foreign_names.flavor: Onde os dragões outrora prevaleceram, hoje seus ossos afundam.
foreign_names.name: Delta Poluído
foreign_names.text: {T}, Pague 1 ponto de vida, Sacrifique Delta Poluído: Procure um card de Ilha ou Pântano em seu grimório e coloque-o no campo de batalha. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.

name: Watery Grave
original_text: As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Watery Grave enters the battlefield tapped.

rulings.text: Unlike most dual lands, this land has two basic land types. It’s not basic, so cards such as District Guide can’t find it, but it does have the appropriate land types for effects such as that of Drowned Catacomb (from the Ixalan set).
If an effect puts this land onto the battlefield tapped, you may pay 2 life, but it still enters tapped.

text: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.) As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

name: Spellstutter Sprite
original_text:
Flash
Flying
When Spellstutter Sprite enters the battlefield, counter target spell with converted mana cost X or less, where X is the number of Faeries you control.

rulings.text: The value of X needs to be determined both when the ability triggers (so you can choose a target) and again when the ability resolves (to check if that target is still legal). If the number of Faeries you control has decreased enough in that time to make the target illegal, Spellstutter Sprite’s ability won’t resolve (and the targeted spell will resolve as normal).

text:

name: Thoughtseize
original_text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

rulings.text: The loss of life is part of the spell’s effect. It’s not an additional cost. If Thoughtseize doesn’t resolve, you won’t lose life.
If you target yourself with this spell, you must reveal your entire hand to the other players just as any other player would.

text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

name: Fatal Push

rulings.text: Fatal Push can target any creature, even one with converted mana cost 5 or greater. The creature’s converted mana cost is checked only as Fatal Push resolves.
If the mana cost of a creature on the battlefield includes {X}, X is considered to be 0.

Revolt abilities check only whether a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn or not. They don’t apply multiple times if more than one permanent you controlled left the battlefield. They don’t check whether the permanent that left the battlefield is still in the zone it moved to.

Revolt abilities don’t care why the permanent left the battlefield, who caused it to move, or where it moved to. They’re equally satisfied by an artifact you sacrificed to pay a cost, a creature you controlled that was destroyed by Murder, or an enchantment you returned to your hand with Leave in the Dust.
Tokens that leave the battlefield will satisfy a revolt ability.
Energy counters aren’t permanents. Paying {E} won’t satisfy a revolt ability.

text: Destroy target creature if it has converted mana cost 2 or less. Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has converted mana cost 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

flavor:
"As you inject the viscus vitae into the brain stem, don't let the spastic moaning bother you. It will soon become music to your ears." 
—Stitcher Geralf

foreign_names.flavor: „Wenn du den viscus vitae in das Stammhirn spritzt, lass dich nicht vom krampfartigen Stöhnen ablenken. Es wird bald schon Musik in deinen Ohren sein." —Geralf der Näher
foreign_names.name: Gedanken ausradieren
foreign_names.text:
Ein Spieler deiner Wahl legt die obersten zwei Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.
Ziehe eine Karte.

foreign_names.flavor: "Conforme inyectes el viscus vitae en el bulbo raquídeo, que no te molesten los gemidos espásticos. Pronto serán música para tus oídos." —Suturador Geralf
foreign_names.name: Depuración de pensamientos
foreign_names.text:
El jugador objetivo pone las primeras dos cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio.
Roba una carta.

foreign_names.flavor: « Quand vous injectez le viscus vitae dans le cervelet, ne vous laissez pas impressionner par les gémissements incontrôlés. Vous les percevrez rapidement comme une mélodie. » —Raccommodeur Geralf
foreign_names.name: Écurage de pensée
foreign_names.text:
Le joueur ciblé met les deux cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.
Piochez une carte.

foreign_names.flavor: "Quando inietti il viscus vitae nello stelo del cervello, non ti far distrarre dal lamento spastico. Ben presto sarà musica per le tue orecchie." —Cucitore Geralf
foreign_names.name: Rovistapensieri
foreign_names.text:
Un giocatore bersaglio mette nel suo cimitero le prime due carte del suo grimorio.
Pesca una carta.

foreign_names.flavor: 「脳幹に臓器剤を注入すれば、痙攣性のうめき声など気にならなくなる。すぐに音楽のように聞こえるだろう。」――縫い師、ゲラルフ
foreign_names.name: 思考掃き
foreign_names.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは、自分のライブラリーの一番上から２枚のカードを自分の墓地に置く。カードを１枚引く。

foreign_names.flavor: "뇌간에 '생명내장'을 주입할 때 신음 소리가 날 수도 있는데, 신경 쓰지 마. 얼마 안 가서 넌 그 소리를 즐기게 될 거야." —봉합술사 게랄프
foreign_names.name: 생각의 박멸
foreign_names.text:
플레이어 한 명을 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 두 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.
카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreign_names.flavor: "Quando injetar o viscus vitae no tronco cerebral, não se incomode com os gemidos espasmódicos. Logo serão música para os seus ouvidos." — Suturador Geralf
foreign_names.name: Purgar Pensamento
foreign_names.text:
O jogador alvo coloca os dois cards do topo do grimório dele no próprio cemitério.
Compre um card.

foreign_names.flavor: «Вкалывая жизненные флюиды в мозг, не расстраивайтесь, услышав судорожные стоны. Вскоре они начнут звучать для вас как музыка». — сшиватель Геральф
foreign_names.name: Промывка Мыслей
foreign_names.text:
Целевой игрок кладет две верхние карты своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.
Возьмите карту.

foreign_names.flavor: 「将生命精华注入脑干时，别让那些断续呻吟分了心。它很快就会化作耳中美妙乐章。」～拼接师基拉夫
foreign_names.name: 洗清思想
foreign_names.text: 目标牌手将其牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。抓一张牌。

foreign_names.flavor: 「將生命精華注入腦幹時，別讓那些斷續呻吟分了心。它很快就會化作耳中美妙樂章。」～拼接師基拉夫
foreign_names.name: 洗清思想
foreign_names.text: 目標玩家將其牌庫頂的兩張牌置入其墳墓場。抽一張牌。

name: Thought Scour
original_text:
Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: If the target player is an illegal target when Thought Scour tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t draw a card.
Follow the instructions in the order listed on the card: if you target yourself, you’ll put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard and then draw a card.

text:
Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.
Draw a card.

flavor: Some worlds possess a hidden core where life's essence constantly surges.
name: Mutavault

rulings.text: Although Mutavault has all creature types while it’s animated, it does not have the changeling keyword ability.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.
Examples of creature types include Sliver, Goblin, and Soldier. Creature types appear after the dash on the type line of creatures.

text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}: Mutavault becomes a 2/2 creature with all creature types until end of turn. It's still a land.

flavor: Few believe Duskmantle exists. Fewer find it. None live to bear witness.

foreign_names.flavor: Nur wenige glauben, dass die Dämmerhülle existiert. Noch weniger finden sie. Niemand lebt lange genug, um von ihr zu berichten.
foreign_names.name: Nasses Grab
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {U} oder {B}.)
Sowie das Nasse Grab ins Spiel kommt, kannst du 2 Lebenspunkte bezahlen. Falls du dies nicht tust, kommt es getappt ins Spiel.

foreign_names.flavor: Pocos creen en la existencia de Mantoscuro. Menos aún lo encuentran. Ninguno vive para ser testigo.
foreign_names.name: Tumba inundada
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Agrega {U} o {B}.)
En cuanto la Tumba inundada entre al campo de batalla, puedes pagar 2 vidas. Si no lo haces, entra al campo de batalla girada.

foreign_names.flavor: Rares sont ceux qui croient à l'existence de Manteaubrune. Ceux qui y accèdent sont encore moins nombreux. Aucun ne vit pour en témoigner.
foreign_names.name: Tombe aquatique
foreign_names.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {U} ou {B}.)
Au moment où la Tombe aquatique arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez payer 2 points de vie. Si vous ne le faites pas, elle arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.

foreign_names.flavor: In pochi credono nell'esistenza di Mantoscuro. Sono ancora meno coloro che la trovano. Nessuno sopravvive per raccontarlo.
foreign_names.name: Tomba d'Acqua
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {U} o {B}.)
Mentre la Tomba d'Acqua entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi pagare 2 punti vita. Se non lo fai, entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.

foreign_names.flavor: ダスクマントルの存在を信じる者は少ない。それを見た者はもっと少ない。それを証言する生存者はいない。
foreign_names.name: 湿った墓
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：{U}か{B}を加える。）
湿った墓が戦場に出るに際し、あなたは２点のライフを支払ってもよい。そうしないなら、これはタップ状態で戦場に出る。

foreign_names.flavor: 아주 소수만이 더스크맨틀이 존재한다고 믿는다. 더 적은 수만이 더스크맨틀을 발견한다. 아무도 살아남아서 이를 증언할 수 없다.
foreign_names.name: 수몰된 무덤
foreign_names.text:
({T}: {U} 또는 {B}를 추가한다.)
수몰된 무덤이 전장에 들어오면서, 당신은 생명 2점을 지불할 수 있다. 그러지 않으면, 수몰된 무덤은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.

foreign_names.flavor: Poucos creem que o Manto do Crepúsculo exista. Pouquíssimos o encontram. Ninguém vive para contar.
foreign_names.name: Túmulo Aquático
foreign_names.text:
({T}: Adicione {U} ou {B}.)
Conforme Túmulo Aquático entra no campo de batalha, você pode pagar 2 pontos de vida. Se não fizer isso, ele entrará no campo de batalha virado.

foreign_names.flavor: Немногие верят в существование Мантии Сумрака. Еще меньше тех, кто ее находил. И никого не осталось в живых, чтобы рассказать об этом.
foreign_names.name: Водная Могила
foreign_names.text:
({T}: добавьте {U} или {B}.)
При выходе Водной Могилы на поле битвы вы можете заплатить 2 жизни. Если вы этого не делаете, она выходит на поле битвы повернутой.

foreign_names.flavor: 没什么人相信暮篷存在。亲眼见到者更少。而见到后还能报信的，则一个都没有。
foreign_names.name: 积水墓地
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{U}或{B}。）
于积水墓地进战场时，你可以支付2点生命。如果你未如此作，则积水墓地须横置进战场。

foreign_names.flavor: 沒什麼人相信暮篷存在。親眼見到者更少。而見到後還能報信的，則一個都沒有。
foreign_names.name: 積水墓地
foreign_names.text:
（{T}：加{U}或{B}。）
於積水墓地進戰場時，你可以支付2點生命。如果你未如此作，則積水墓地須橫置進戰場。
